articles.content: The first person who died from the coronavirus in the US passed from a ruptured heart caused by her bodys effort to defeat the virus, according to her autopsy. Patricia Dowd, a 57-year-old from California, died on February 6 — far earlier than the February 29… [+2710 chars]

articles.title: COVID-19: Government guidelines on using ACs, fans and coolers; details here - The Financial Express
articles.description: In order to avoid any kind of transmission of the novel Coronavirus through air conditioners, the Indian Society of Heating, Refrigerating and Air Conditioning Engineers (ISHRAE) has released some guidelines for household as well as public sector outlets.

articles.title: COVID-19 Detected on Two Dutch Mink Farms After Animals Started to Show Symptoms - Newsweek
articles.description: Investigations are in place to work out how the animals in the Netherlands' southern province of Noord-Brabant became infected with the novel coronavirus.
articles.content:
Animals from two mink farms in the Netherlands were found to have COVID-19 after developing symptoms, including gastrointestinal and respiratory problems, the country's Agriculture Ministry said in a statement published Sunday.

articles.description: Andhra Pradesh has developed an app to monitor the people coming to medical shops for over-the-counter drugs for cough, cold and breathing problems. ​
